subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: What was the name of the first Rajput kingdom in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में पहला राजपूत राज्य का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Rathore was the first Rajput kingdom in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: राठौर राजस्थान में पहला राजपूत राज्य था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: Who was the founder of Mewar kingdom?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was the founder of Mewar kingdom.
explanation_hi: बापा रावल मेवाड़ के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: What was the name of the Rajput kingdom that ruled over Marwar?
question_hi: मरवाड़ पर शासन करने वाला राजपूत राज्य का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Rathore was the Rajput kingdom that ruled over Marwar.
explanation_hi: राठौर मरवाड़ पर शासन करता था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: Who was the ruler of Amber during the Mughal era?
question_hi: मुग़ल काल में अम्बर का शासक कौन था?
explanation_en: Man Singh I was the ruler of Amber during the Mughal era.
explanation_hi: मन सिंह I मुग़ल काल में अम्बर के शासक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: What was the name of the famous trade route that passed through Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान से गुजरने वाली प्रसिद्ध व्यापार मार्ग का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Maru-Gurjar Road was the famous trade route that passed through Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: मारु-गुर्जर रोड राजस्थान से गुजरने वाली प्रसिद्ध व्यापार मार्ग थी।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: Who was the founder of the Sisodiya dynasty of Mewar?
question_hi: मेवाड़ के सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Bappa Rawal was the founder of the Sisodiya dynasty of Mewar.
explanation_hi: बापा रावल मेवाड़ के सिसोदिया वंश के संस्थापक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: What was the name of the famous Rajput king who fought against the Mughal Empire?
question_hi: मुग़ल साम्राज्य के विरुद्ध लड़ने वाले प्रसिद्ध राजपूत शासक का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Maharana Pratap was the famous Rajput king who fought against the Mughal Empire.
explanation_hi: महाराणा प्रताप मुग़ल साम्राज्य के विरुद्ध लड़े।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: Who was the ruler of Marwar during the Mughal era?
question_hi: मुग़ल काल में मरवाड़ का शासक कौन था?
explanation_en: Sur Singh was the ruler of Marwar during the Mughal era.
explanation_hi: सूर सिंह मुग़ल काल में मरवाड़ के शासक थे।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: What was the name of the famous fort in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में प्रसिद्ध किला का नाम क्या था?
explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort was the famous fort in Jodhpur.
explanation_hi: मेहरानगढ़ किला जोधपुर में प्रसिद्ध किला था।

subject: Rajasthan History
topic: Madhyakalin Rajasthan mein Prashasanik aur Rajasva Vyavastha
question_en: Who was the founder of the Hadauti kingdom?
question_hi: हाड़ौती राज्य के संस्थापक कौन थे?
explanation_en: Gangaur was the founder of the Hadauti kingdom.
explanation_hi: गंगावाट हाड़ौती राज्य के संस्थापक थे।
